3D printing also known as additive manufacturing. Refers to the manufacturing process and all technology related to printing a three-dimensional object. 3D printing encompasses the actual printer as well as software including 3D versions of CAD which utilizes multiple data points to create cross-sectional patterns of the object to be formed.
NKAD

In order to provide households and public institutions (markets school canteens) with an adapted and efficient sanitation service LONO has designed and tested a compact modular and easy-to-use solution: the KubeKo Box. Three aspects were considered essential for the desgin were: Ease to use Low maintenance High yield and Esthetics. The Esthetic design was considered a priority in order to allow for a marketing campaign to associate KubeKo with success. In order to validate the design a standardized methodology was applied to various feedstock available locally such as kitchen waste chicken manure cacao waste cashew waste etc. Presenting the same specificities as a complete biogas plant KubeKo offers the possibility of converting a relatively small amount of organic waste (from 2kg / day to 100 kg / day) for the production of biogas (ideal substitute for cooking gas) and a nutrient-rich liquid fertilizer for food and perennial crops.

Feelobject is launching its first product Virtuoz a tactile and interactive plan offering opportunities to move regardless of location to promote the inclusion of people with visual impairments.
 Virtuoz represents a building floor plan made in 3D printing simplified to the maximum.
 In this plan the required guides are added as symbols. Thanks to touch the person can thus obtain a clear mental visualization of the space.
 By pressing on the symbols it obtains sound information that enriches the understanding of the location.
 Each product is manufactured on demand customizable and configurable.
 Virtuoz offers the ability to compose his way to live a unique experience. People with visual impairments may become in the art of positioning themselves even in a complex environment. This score gives the power to explore the world with confidence and autonomy from a fixed plane which also blends into a portable format (Virtuoz Mini) for greater agility.

Audiospot développe un service clé en main de diffusion d'informations géo personnalisées sur smartphone accessible à tous.
 S’appuyant sur le taux d'équipement smartphone toujours grandissant et sur les technologies sans contact AudioSpot a développé de bout en bout un dispositif permettant de créer des parcours de diffusion d’informations géo localisées indoor et outdoor permettant au souscripteur d’offrir à leurs visiteurs un service de proximité enrichissant sa venue sur le site équipé en y proposant des informations adaptées en profil et en langue et ce en fonction du lieu où se trouve le visiteur.
 AudioSpot propose une chaîne de moyens permettant la mise en œuvre de son service :
 - Un gestionnaire de paramétrage en mode Saas permettant de créer et de manager chaque point d’interaction : 
 o un point peut être matérialisé par un beacon de la réalité augmentée un point GPS ou par nos propres bornes AudioSpot proxity élues Projet industriel d’avenir 2017
 o le gestionnaire permet de paramétrer la diffusion des contenus pour chaque point en fonction de la distance du smartphone à ce point de l’orientation du smartophone des points précédemment déclenchés d’un point de destination dans une optique de guidage
 - un gestionnaire de contenus en mode Saas permettant de créer et de manager pour chaque point d’interaction :
 o des contenus audio en text-to-speech ou des fichiers audio pré enregistrés
 o des pages HTML pour mobile
 o des plans et cartes
 - une application générique AudioSpot également disponible en marque blanche disponible sur IOS et Android.

Garde d'enfants aide administrative et juridique services d’aidants familiaux soutien scolaire management de projets... autant de sujets sur lesquels les salariés seront accompagnés par nos conseillers parentalité. Nous proposons un dispositif de soutien à la parentalité unique pour une offre de services équitable et accessible à tous et ce pour un investissement contenu.
 
 Un dispositif innovant pour accompagner la parentalité 
 L’accompagnement parentalité d’Une Vie de Famille allie l’accompagnement humain et personnalisé à la performance d’un outil digital puissant. 
 
 ? Des conseillers parentalité pour accompagner vos collaborateurs
 ? Des ateliers conférences et café-parents organisés au sein de l’entreprise
 ? Une plateforme multiservices pour accompagner la parentalité à 360°
 ? Un outil pour fédérer la communauté de parents en entreprise
 
 Nos activités
 
 1) Des conseillers parentalité pour accompagner de manière personnalisée vos collaborateurs
 Chaque collaborateur vit une parentalité qui lui est propre et a besoin d’être accompagné de manière personnalisée en fonction de sa situation et de l’âge de ses enfants. 
 
 2) Des ateliers conférences et café-parents organisés au sein de l’entreprise
 -2h pour apprendre et échanger entre parents avec un expert parentalité
 -Un moment convivial intense en partages
 -Des thématiques variées répondant aux besoins des parents
 -Des coachs spécialisés et une parfaite connaissance des besoins des parents
 -Un booster d’optimisme et de bien être
 
 3) Une plateforme multiservices pour accompagner la parentalité à 360°
 Qui va garder bébé lorsque je reprendrai le travail et où trouver la perle rare ? Combien de temps dure le congé paternité ? Comment gérer les démarches administrative et juridique pour l’embauche de ma nounou ? Comment accompagner au mieux mon enfant dans sa scolarité ? Comment aider mes proches dépendants de manière réellement impactante?
 
 Garde d’enfants aide administrative et juridique soutien scolaire aidant familiaux … Autant de services proposés par Une Vie de Famille qui permettront à vos collaborateurs de trouver des réponses concrètes à leurs besoins. 
 
 -> Nos engagements 
 Ø Transmettre de l’information qualifiée 
 Ø Favoriser l’échange et le partage 
 Ø Donner accès à des services favorisant le quotidien des salariés 
 Ø Partager les bons plans via nos réseaux partenaires
 Ø Accompagner à la recherche de mode d’accueil individuel pour les parents

Active and connected sound masking solution dedicated to improve comfort and concentration of shared offices users.

Based on sound masking technology Silent Space diffuses a neutral and homogeneous signal which reduces the speech intelligibility allowing shared offices users to stay focused on their activity. It decreases distraction radius by reducing surrounding conversations comprehension and it creates discreation areas.
 
 Silent Space presents three major innovations:
 - A LED indicator that shows the noise level by changing color
 - A connected mobile application to configure & control devices and collect data
 - A plug&play installation with a quick and easy electrical connection

We provide Out-Of-Home advertising to companies adding a real-time feedback regarding the target audience on a dashboard.
 Our service includes : 
 • Recruitment of taxi drivers
 • Graphic design
 • Printing of the stickers
 • Covering (+uncovering) of the cars
 • GPS trackers installation
 • 24/7 online platform
 
 Trackers send car-locations to our servers. Then our algorithm sources open-data in order to model the amount of OTS (occasions to see) generated by each car. Some of parameters taken in account are: city district time day month weather instant speed... 
 Once the algorithm calculated how much views were generated it instantly qualifies the target: location age gender social class... 
 
 All these informations are displayed on the customer's monitoring dashboard in real-time.
 At the end of the campaign we edit a reporting which gathers key informations regarding the performance.
 
 The purpose of our company is to bring online-marketing strengths to Out-Of-Home advertising including : feedback targeting and retargeting.

Chaque technique est adaptée aux espèces végétales qu’il produit en grande quantité. daco offre aux marques de mode et aux marketplaces une compréhension raffinée de leur environnement concurrentiel. Notre start-up leur permet de comprendre la stratégie de leurs concurrents en temps réel toute l'année grâce à des tableaux de bord en ligne sur l'offre le prix les promotions et le réseau de magasins. Pour cela nous extrayons les données des site e-commerce nous alignons des millions de produits sur la segmentation homogène de nos clients par reconnaissance d’image (intelligence artificielle) et nous fournissons les visualisation de données par une plateforme SaaS.
 Nous innovons sur 3 axes :
 - Ampleur des données fournies : même une équipe dédiée ne pourrait au sein d’une maison étudier toutes les informations de Zalando Farfetch Yoox ou Zara chaque semaine.
 - Identification des produits comparables : nous pouvons identifier et comparer toutes les robes noires courtes à manches longues -par exemple- d’un ensemble de marques concurrentes !
 - Précision métier : nos solutions allient les technologies les plus récentes (deep learning) avec l’expertise métier d’acteurs tels que l’IFM
 En 1 an d’existence nous avons déployé notre solution chez près de 15 clients sur 3 cas d’usage :
 - Marques de mode (habillement / chaussures / accessoires)
 - Plateformes de distribution désireuses d'obtenir un avantage concurrentiel
 - Cabinets de tendance cabinets de conseil en stratégie fonds d'investissement souhaitant à valider l'attractivité réelle d'une entreprise qu'ils détiennent ou ciblent
 Notre technologie nous permet d'étendre nos solutions par géographie et par marché. Nous prévoyons également d'utiliser nos briques technologiques propriétaires et notre département R & D pour développer de nouveaux produits et diversifier nos secteurs d'activité.

 An estimated 90% of information needed to generate actionable knowledge is hidden in unstructured data such as text memos documents emails maintenance records phone transcripts research reports and voice to text translations. Additionally the amount of information keeps growing and the number of smart engineers and doctors who would generate actionable knowledge in the past won’t keep pace with the growth in quantity and quality of data. Therefore we need systems which assist smart people with smart analysis. 
 In the past deriving actionable knowledge was based on people evaluating and making sense of data often combined with ”tribal knowledge”. In the future knowledge will be derived based on automated analysis of structured and unstructured information. LexaTexer understands unstructured sources and turns that information into actionable knowledge.

A robot that takes care of your wellbeing and the energy efficiency of buildings? This is Diya One X a worldwide innovation in mobile IoT and gateway devices. Completely autonomous and open platform it monitors the building’s environmental quality and purifies the indoor air.

A robot that takes care of your wellbeing and the energy efficiency of buildings? This is Diya One X worldwide innovation in mobile IoT and gateway devices. Completely autonomous and open platform it monitors the building’s environmental quality and purifies the indoor air.

Diya One X worldwide innovation is the first robot entirely dedicated to improve the indoor air quality and the wellbeing of the buildings’ occupants.
 The robot navigates smoothly and autonomously in large and dynamic indoor environments (1000m²): office buildings train stations airports… Building on its incredible mobility it measures locally and in real time all the factors related to the wellbeing of the buildings’ occupants:
 - CO2
 - VOCs
 - Ozone
 - Fine Particles
 - Temperature
 - Relative Humidity
 - Light level
 - Noise level
 Mobile IoT device Diya One X replaces an incredible number of sensors that you would have to install everywhere in the building. Thanks to this incredible new knowledge it is now possible to take concrete and informed actions towards a better indoor environment and air quality.
 Big data are accessible on a secured and dedicated server for a smarter and more energy friendly building management. Comprehensive the data even allow to access indoor weather maps. The robot itself communicates in real time with the connected systems of the building. E.g. Diya One X can talk to the building’s HVAC and adjust the air flow according to the real time data for significant energy savings (20% to 30% depending on the building’s infrastructure).
 As we believe it is also important to show building’s occupants their environment and that we are taking care of them we have created Diya Board a personalized wall screen that displays the data collected by the robot in a friendly interface. The data are also displayed on the robot’s touch screen.
 We equipped Diya One X with an advanced air filter (similar to the ones in surgical rooms) that purifies the indoor air as the robot navigates. Creating a healthy air bubble around people the robot drastically improves the wellbeing and health of building’s occupants removing 99.95% of the indoor air pollutants bacteria and viruses. The monitoring and purifying performances of the robot have been scientifically validated by the CSTB the main independent French scientific lab for buildings’ technologies.
 Getaway IoT mobile and open platform Diya One X allows to co-innovate with the client to introduce new services and interactions on the robot. The robot does not talk (it is indeed an ethical choice) but communicates with users thanks to a friendly interface a droid language and colorful LEDs. Diya One X does not perform someone’s job and as its design serves its purpose it is particularly well accepted in the workplace (81% of coworkers trust the robot).
 Not a prototype Diya One X is a real product that already performs in France in the headquarters of Fortune 500 companies (Engie Societe Generale Maif Malakoff Mederic…) in retail spaces (Galeries Lafayette) and busy train stations. It is the only robot that secured a CE marking after intensive physical electronic electromagnetic and software European security tests.

Artificial intelligence technology is coming into our lives more than ever before and it is rapidly changing our everyday life. Especially current AI technology is highly focused on natural language processing (NLP) computer vision and speech recognition. Emerging AI home assistant devices such as Google Home and Amazon Echo are based on speech recognition and NLP. However we have a question here “Why no services use the information from the audio than speech?”
 
 Humans except hearing-impaired use this non-verbal audio information to think to decide and to act. For example we can guess someone is cooking from the water boiling and food chopping sound. We can even know whether someone is wearing a pair of sneakers or high heels by only listening to the footsteps. Even if humans use this information naturally and easily in everyday life computers can not do that and this is the problem we are tackling. We believe that future AI service should provide appropriate services without intentional input thus inferring context from the audio will take an important role in AI technology in the future.
 
 Cochlear.ai aims to develop an AI system that can understand the semantics of audio. We are a team consisting of 6 audio signal processing and machine learning engineers (3 PhDs 2 PhD candidates 1 MS) studied together at Music and Audio Research Group Seoul National University. We are a highly research-based company providing service through cloud APIs and on-device solutions for developers to easily make creative applications.
 
 Cochlear.ai team dominated top places of leaderboards of IEEE Detection and Classification of Acoustic Scene and Events (DCASE 2017) one of the biggest international challenges on analysing environmental sound. Also we have been identified as a top 4 AI startup in autonomous systems by NVIDIA inception.

TechSee transforms the customer assistance with a visual customer experience powered by AI and Augmented Reality. TechSee’s cognitive visual platform applies deep learning computer vision algorithms which learn from every customer interaction to automate the support process over time.

TechSee transforms the customer support domain with a visual customer experience powered by AI and Augmented Reality. TechSee’s cognitive visual platform applies deep learning computer vision algorithms which learn from every customer interaction to automate the support process over time. 
 THE CHALLANGE
 The skyrocketing number of connected devices has become an increasingly important area of focus for many customer support organizations. More than 20 billion connected devices by 2020 are expected to generate an overwhelming amount of new support requests for installation activation and troubleshooting. Service providers realize that today’s linear support model does not scale economically or organizationally to support the exponential growth of IoT connected devices. Furthermore with enterprises recognizing that the key to increasing retention satisfaction and sales lies in their ability to improve their CX the visual gap between technical support and consumers is frustrating and costly. 
 In light of these challenges enterprises are seeking for new tools for automation and self-service to reduce costs and increase customer experience. 
 OUR VISION 
 Keep the connected home up & running with visual customer assistance powered by AI & AR. TechSee’s visual engagement platform enables enterprises to provide a visual and interactive customer experience via their smartphones while enhancing customer satisfaction and reducing costs. 
 THE SOLUTION 
 We provide a visual customer engagement platform which provides enterprises with automation roadmap aiming to reach a full self-service. This is done with the following stages: 
 Remote Visual Support: deployed in contact centers and field services. ‘TechSee Live’ enables the tech support agents to simply diagnose issues teleported via customer’s smartphone and provide visual and interactive guidance with augmented reality tools. The ongoing usage is used for crowdsourcing of expertise and optimization. 
 Virtual Technician for Agents: empowering the contact center agents with a decision support tool applying automated image recognition of devices troubleshooting guidance and visual auto-recommendations. 
 Virtual Technician for self-service: self service visual bot operated within consumer’s smartphone. The virtual assistant is able to auto-recognize equipment and augment guidance (including augmented manuals troubleshooting assistance installation guides). 
 KEY BENEFITS
 Increasing customer satisfaction with fast resolution of tech issues 
 Reducing operational costs and improve KPIs
 Boosting agent productivity with visual automation and reduce labor intensity 
 Enhancing self service with visual and interactive CX
 OUR TECHNOLOGY 
 AI: TechSee platform applies deep learning computer vision proprietary algorythms on a massive data set of visual tech issues collected with our customers. This repository includes more than 1.2 million images 1500 devices and 700K labels. The system recognizes tech equipment in accuracy of 95% and associates it with common technical issues and their resolutions. 
 Augmented Reality: with augmented reality the customer receives an overlay of technical guidance either by a remote contact center agent or by a self-service virtual assistant. This includes tracking of objects real time drawing for guidance and augmentation of information. 
 Video Platform: Tech See’s enterprise grade cloud video platform handles 30K session monthly in average serving more than 10K end users. 
 
 OUR CUSTOMERS & PARTNERS 
 Among our customers are the global key players on telecommunications and Consumer Electronics industries such as: Vodafone Orange Altice Libery Global Samsung Nespresso. We are cooperating with a global network of partners (Consultancy BPOs Vendors) such as: Accenture Teleperformance Comdata Amdocs CSG Cartesian. 
 OUR PROVEN FIELD RESULTS
 TechSee demonstrates a consistent KPI improvements across dozens of implementations in more than 20 countries. These improvements include: 17% reduction in truck rolls 20% increase in first call resolution 40% increase in NPS score and 12% reduction in average handling time. 
 TESTIMONIALS
 “With TechSee we are able to resolve a significant number of customer issues remotely together with the customer without having to send technicians. Besides the cost savings our customer satisfaction has increased because we provide more effective service saving time and solving the issue on the spot”
 George de Visser Director Customer Care Vodafone-Ziggo 
 “TechSee empowers our agents to provide a more effective and efficient service and a better customer experience to our clients. By offering intuitive visual support both call center performance and customer satisfaction have improved significantly”. 
 Agustin Martin Mayo Provisioing & Robotics director Orange

In the future all the machines will be intelligent make intelligent decisions AND explain us why. Tellmeplus has invented Predictive Objects the next step in the evolution of AI: the Asset Intelligence put the intelligence where data is produced and decisions need to be made

Sgnl receives voice signals from users’ phone using Bluetooth. When voice signal is received sgnl generates vibration through its body conduction unit(BCU) which transmits the vibrations through users’ wrist to their fingertip. As transmission is made with vibration there is no risk of harm to body. When you put your fingertip to your ear the vibration echo creates amplified sound within the closed space of your ear. The key component of fingertip communication is the Body Conduction Unit (BCU) which transmits vibrations through wrist to fingertip and the algorithm which analyze distortion and signal decay to receive original sound from wrist to fingertip. This technology will not only be used for wearable device but also be used for basic technology to transfer AI formation voice interface from limited wearable interface with small touch screen.

Have you have had difficulty sleeping in the last month? Do you really need a Fitbit to tell you that you slept badly? Well what if you had a product that works like your Fitbit but which actively helps you to sleep better? InsomniSolv is developing that product. It’s a patented wearable called somnia that helps you to sleep without taking drugs. It uses a proven technology that provides a rhythmic stimulation which has a hypnotic effect on the brain very much like rocking a baby to sleep. It consists of 2 wristbands which each contain a small vibration motor that provides the stimulation and sensors that track your sleep. A smart phone app reads the sensors and uses a proprietary AI algorithm to control the stimulations to help you fall asleep and then stay asleep. Our cloud-based app will collect users’ data which we will use to develop new algorithms. And because this is a closed loop control system being both a monitor and a therapeutic we will be able to offer personalized therapy using AI algorithms. We have preliminary results from our clinical trial that show a 40% improvement in falling asleep faster and a 40% improvement in staying asleep longer. If somnia works this well without drugs imagine how well it could word with drugs.

We provide municipalities and decision-makes with a tool to better tackle air pollution!
 
 Why? Because there are great initiatives to combat air pollution around Europe and the World. 
 
 But a couple of things are missing when taking on this important task.
 
 First there is no widespread available tool to identify the pollution hotspots. There are solutions in place that show the overall pollution levels within cities but they fail to provide a micro-analysis at a street level (that's where IntelFlows comes in).
 
 Second there are no widespread available solutions to keep track of the impact of proposed policies. If decision-makers take actions to combat air pollution again they will only be able to assess the overall results and not the specific actions (that's where IntelFlows comes in) 
 
 Third there is no widespread available tool to inform the citizens about the pollution levels in their area (that's where IntelFlows comes in with an API solution and dedicated mobile app) 
 
 Comparing to the current way of monitoring air pollution which relies on having a couple of FIXED stations across the city (with a coverage of roughly 1 square kilometer) IntelFlows is using the power of IoT Big Data and Sensing Technologies to provide an accurate street-level analysis on air pollution. 
 
 By installing our devices that monitor air pollution have GSM and GPS on vehicles (mostly public transportation) we are creating a Network of Moving Sensors. The data from these sensors combined with data (Copernicus satellite data data from already available air pollution monitoring stations) IntelFlows is creating heat-maps generating insights and offering an overview of the air pollution status in urban settlements. 
 
 Transportation companies have been given their share of criticism for contributing to the air pollution in our cities. With IntelFlows transportation companies can now bring their contribution to fighting air pollution by helping mapping the environment. 
 
 Moreover for transportation companies with resources available there are ways they can contribute. 
 As an example companies that have electric vehicles in their fleets can now implement a system to deploy the electric vehicles in the areas that are most polluted in the city this way avoiding to contribute more to the air pollution in those crucial areas where the limits are overly exceeded.

 Toucan Toco's 5 pillars :
 - mobility: accessible on mobile phone tablet and PC. A published dashboard is accessible on all the supports.

eOdyn specializes in operational oceanography and massive data analysis. The startup developed an algorithm to calculate surface currents using the geolocation data transmitted by ships at sea through AIS (Automatic Identification System). In many developed countries household recycling is seen as one of the most important civic duties after the right to vote. Yet waste sorting rates have been stagnating for years.
 At the same time consumers are ever more demanding and proactive in their ways of consuming:
 8 out of 10 French make the effort to read the nutrition facts label when buying a product for the first
 time but almost 60% consider these to be hard to figure out or understand.
 
 Eugène is a smart device connected to a mobile application that has the ambition to turn your
 kitchen bin into a useful set of tools allowing for a responsible consumption while making your life
 easier. 
 
 The way it works is very simple. All you have to do is scanning your product barcode just before just you throw it away and Eugène will tell you how to sort properly each component of your packaging with regards to the rules of your city. You earn points for each scanned item and access discounts on your favorite brands’ products. 
 
 But Eugène is much more than a recycling guide. As discarded product often needs to be repurchased Eugène will add each scanned product to your next grocery list on its App. And this shopping list you can use it in store as a reminder or send it in one click to your favorite retailer for delivery or drive. It’s a bit like the Amazon Dash Button but working for any products and with any retailers.
 
 Last not the least Eugène helps you figure out which products suit you best. 
 Ingredients allergens quality-labels nutritional values... Get to know the ins and outs of your products without having to read and remember the tiny information behind the pack. 
 
 From your bon to your Cart Eugène Eugène will help all along your consumption process to make the right choices. Revealing the true value of your waste.
 
 Our business model relies on 2 pillars.
 
 On the one hand we sell the device to the end consumers directly via our website but also through classic distribution channels. 
 
 On the hand we develop commercial partnerships with brands retailers. We help them to better understand how their products are consumed providing them unique real time consumption studies via our web application. 
 We also offer them the opportunity to develop direct relationships with our customers through loyalty schemes via our mobile application turning waste into valuable data. 
 
 We already partnered with more than 150 major brands and retailers as Unilever Nestlé Danone Carrefour Casino etc.

The OpenDataSoft platform is a cloud-based data publishing solution that lets users share their data easily via APIs. Cities transportation providers government administrations utility companies and private-sector companies use the platform in order to publish visualize and share data in order to break down silos and facilitate their reuse. Data become easily understandable thanks to charts tables search filtering and mapping features. In turning all datasets into APIs with aggregation faceting query and real-time capabilities data can be reused in applications and new services that create new or improve services in the Smart City. In addition the platform has unique data distribution features via its sub domain capabilities. These allow data producers to much more easily publish their data and content and push them to a parent domain with for example greater visibility in order to further improve the circulation and access to data. One of the platform’s main goals is to serve as a central hub for data to help build a data network. This would include Smart City and IoT data in addition to government data and the data generated by citizens. It is only with the widest possible diversity of data that true data ecosystems can be created to maximize the possibilities of building innovative solutions to improve our cities and communities.

Mobeelity is the first inter modal platform gathering both public and private essential transportation means for your daily commutes.
 
 Whether you are looking for a fast way to go to work a green way to move around your city or just to make some time/money savings on your daily commutes Mobeelity offers you a personalized experience in real time. 
 
 Disruptly innovative Mobeelity integrates technologies such as :
 • An artificial intelligence able to personalize a user experience to its user profile ;
 • Geo-predictive algorithms learning from your commute habits to suggest you the best tips and experiences
 • But also a brand new inter modal algorithm that combines different transportation means to optimize your daily commutes with a real time check of any issue that may delay your journey (such as traffic jam or public transportation disruption).
 
 Mobeelity can be downloaded by anyone looking to optimize their daily commutes or a new way to move around the city. We also offer a bunch of solutions to organizations for which mobility is a source of stress for its coworkers or the ones looking to implement more innovative mobility strategies. Our solutions come in three stages:
 1. A digitalized mobility diagnostic: to study your coworkers needs and habits in transportation and accompany your mobility plan.
 2. An inter modal mobility hypervisor platform: to answer your coworkers' daily commutes needs in real time. This platform offers carpooling walk-sharing public transportation bike sharing etc... and any mean of transportation your company may need.
 3. A reporting web platform: to give you a real time glance at your mobility and give you the opportunity to be more proactive in your mobility plan. This platform also gives you an idea of your carbon footprint in real time and offers you solutions to give back to the earth!
 
 As an organizations to encourage your people to use more eco friendly transportation means we developed a virtual money called “Seeds” that your coworkers will earn based on the way they commute. These “Seeds” can be spent in our shop (made of our partners offers but also yours) or be invested back into green economy like trees plantation.
 
 Since a better accessibility is a proven factor of development Mobeelity can represent a great opportunity for some economical areas to gain in attractiveness! 
 
 As a user Mobeelity will become your personal assistant to move around your city !

Company
 
 Vizibiliti is an Artificial Intelligence company creating bespoke software platforms in multiple industries using a repeatable proven software and business methodology.
 
 We have core competencies in financial analytics developing scalable platforms rapid prototyping and a light touch implementation framework.
 
 Our approach when working with large corporate companies is to deliver value to executives and stakeholders within 2 weeks of an engagement. 
 
 Our low-cost pilots tend to run for 3-6 months providing enough time for value delivery while reducing the corporates financial and human resource commitment.
 
 We begin any relationship by acquiring a deep understanding of the customers business the profit and loss centers and the industry they operate in including what their competitors unique value proposition is and what their customers expect.
 
 We then base our success on the actual financial impact of our solutions user-acceptance and how strong our relationship with all stakeholders becomes over a short period of time. 
 
 We have developed use cases and proven software platforms in the following industries:
 
 Manufacturing
 
 Vehicle manufacturing: 
 
 The client is Mercedes-Benz and we are working with them to deliver a first in world predictive geometry platform predicting what geometrical changes need to be made across the production line. An automated recommendation engine suggests what changes need to be made in the production to ensure plant efficiency. 
 
 The purpose of the solution is to identify the relationship with multiple geometric variables and the final outcome after hand on parts have been fitted to a vehicle. The solution has an influence in three significant cost centers; variable labour costs downtime and vehicle quality.
 
 Predictive maintenance is part of the solution identifying specific robots and components at risk of failing in the near future including suggested actions which reduce the risk of downtime fewer vehicles being produced per day and decreased vehicle quality.
 
 
 Financial services and lending:
 
 Our use case is for one of the four biggest banks and one of the largest vehicle finance institutions in South Africa.
 
 Bank (CIB ? Corporate Investment Banking):
 
 An entry-level customer in a CIB environment has an annual turnover of 750+ million Rands (50+ million Euro?s).
 
 The primary business problem is that the bank does not have predictive intelligence which identifies customers at high-risk of moving a product line (credit point-of-sale fixed assets investments) or completely churning (moving all business) to an bank. 
 
 Vizibiliti?s solution was to analyse multiple transactional data sources (credit point of sale deposits investments among various product lines) and identify the relationship between each variable and the actual customer life time value. 
 
 The next step is understanding what the next best action and product should be. This is crucial when a customer has been flagged as high-risk of moving a product line to an bank or churning completely.
 
 An example would be; what should the bank do when a customer has made an unusually large deposit into their account? An option would be for a stockbroker or wealth manager to call the client and recommend a pre-defined product based on what similar customers preferred under similar constraints. 
 
 This one of the many actions cross and up-sell opportunities that present themselves with the use of Vizibiliti?s platforms and expertise.
 
 Non-traditional credit vetting and credit worthiness platform (Vet 360 Global):
 
 Traditional credit analysis models do not provide a comprehensive view of an individual and business risk profile. Often credit scoring and lending is based on internal models banks and lending agencies have developed with the use of credit bureau data. 
 
 In particular there are two audiences this model does not work for. The unbanked and younger entrepreneurs who do not have traditional credit histories. This is compounded by the fact consumers are demanding transparency when their personal data is used ? a concept the current credit system is not familiar with.
 
 This poses a significant challenge for any organisation in the business of providing products and services through credit. There will be one billion new consumers coming online in India China and Africa in the near future. 
 
 These consumers will not have traditional risk profiles however will require credit for communications business supplies housing and transport to name a few.
 
 Vizibiliti?s Vet 360 Global platform will provide an answer to the problem by providing granular analysis of an individuals personal and business tendencies shopping and lifestyle preferences.
 
 The lending community will have intelligence into who to lend to and what type of credit to when and what actions to take next to drive sales in both product and services categories. Predictive intelligence will drive the next generation of credit worthiness with traditional credit scoring models equipping lending agencies to provide products and services to a non-traditional client base. 
 
 
 Commercial real-estate
 
 Vizibiliti has developed 6 commercial real-estate software platforms. The platforms can be applied to retail office industrial and mixed-use properties.
 
 Our platforms compliment one an aiming to provide an end-to-end property solution for finding selecting installing monitoring and maintaining prospects in retail office industrial and mixed-use developments.
 
 
 Experiential retail tenant / landlord match marketplace (Platform: Kukodi):
 
 
 Globally retailers are increasingly looking for shorter-term leases in line with the rapidly changing retail market. 
 
 The trend toward experiential retail is becoming increasingly prevalent and consumer demands for innovative unforgettable experiences will continue to grow. 
 
 Often this means anchor tenants who already occupy a large part of Gross lettable area GLA cannot fill new vacancies and don?t have the unique experiential retail experience necessary to generate increased foot traffic and spend.
 
 When there is a vacancy empty property looks unwanted and undesirable for existing tenants customers and prospects. 
 
 This is compounded by special circumstances like disputes or redevelopment plans making it difficult to attract long-term tenants and commit to traditional long-term leases.
 
 Vizibiliti has developed a marketplace providing traditional landlords the means to access a difficult to find and attract tenant audience. Finally the prospect follows a fully automated onboarding journey (detailed below) decreasing vacancy cost and increasing deal flow. 
 
 Part of the offering are Virtual 3D tours creating an immersive prospect experience reducing tour times prioritising interested prospects reducing vacancies and optimising the placement of tenants. 
 
 Automated Tenant Selection (ATS):
 
 Once a prospective tenant has expressed interest in a property Vizibiliti provides a fully automated vetting application process directly from the marketplace.
 
 This comprises of the collection of regulatory documents credit bureau verification for individuals and businesses and macro economic analysis predicting the success of a prospects business accounting for factors outside the prospects control influencing the success of the business. 
 
 Automated Tenant Selection differentiates itself by measuring 320 different risk indicators proven to impact a prospects sustainability and financial performance in conjunction with traditional credit vetting models.
 
 
 Non-traditional credit vetting for commercial real-estate (Vet 360 CRE):
 
 Integrated into the Automated Tenant Selection product is Vet 360 CRE. 
 
 As experiential & non-traditional retailers enter traditional retail office industrial and mixed-use properties landlords are not geared toward analysing this new market. 
 
 Considering many landlords apply a linear analysis approach of requesting company financials traditional business plans cash flow forecasts and relying on gut feel when considering which tenants to approve entrepreneur?s e-commerce retailers and non-traditional prospects pose a challenge in who to select why when and how lease agreements should be structured to retain these experiential retailers. 
 
 Vizibiliti will provide the right information at the right time for non-traditional prospects equipping landlords to optimise their selection marketing and retention process.
 
 
 Predictive Tenant Mix (PTM)
 
 Once a prospect has been accepted into a property basic rental is the core source of monthly revenue for the landlord. 
 
 The question is then how does a landlord have a way of predicting whether a tenant will default in the next 3+ months?
 
 An dimension of this question is how to optimise the tenant mix. Since landlords are increasingly experiencing vacancies large anchor tenants going bankrupt and new non-traditional tenants entering portfolios it is important to predict revenue loss which tenants can absorb higher rentals and what type of retail categories can grow and occupy more GLA space. 
 
 This integrates into the Automated Tenant Selection platform prioritising new or existing lease renewal applications based on retail category performance.
 
 
 The Predictive Tenant Mix platform enables landlords to predict:
 
 ? The Likelihood of reversion rates being achieved.
 
 ? Which tenants will pay their basic rental utility invoices turnover rent and any invoice due 90-365 days late.
 
 ? Survival analysis identifying the actual number of days the tenant is likely to survive.
 
 ? The likelihood of bad debt
 
 ? The predicted value of bad debt.
 
 ? Macro economic predictions for all 40 retail category types identify growth or deceleration in the next 3-18 months.
 
 ? Turnover predictions in the next 3-6 months.
 
 ? Trading density predictions in the next 3-6 months.
 
 ? Rent to turnover predictions in the next 3-6 months.
 
 ? Provisioning for bad debt (important for shareholder earnings per share (EPS) and dividends.
 
 The final piece of intelligence is at the granular analysis of every invoice and allocation of payments to invoices. 
 
 Findings have shown that there could be operational inefficiency within the credit and debtors team.
 
 An example of this could be payments allocated via a non-traditional means (journal entries incorrect bank accounts reversals including specific individuals contributing to suspicious payment allocations.
 
 Seasonality and trends of suspicious payment allocations are also identified.
 
 Next best action:
 
 Machine learning records specific actions taken by departments over time creating a unique advantage for the landlord. Eventually the platform recommends specific actions proven to decrease risk and increase growth and profit which can be distributed to any department. 
 
 An advantage is that the knowledge base can assist in transferring skills from seasoned property experts within the organisation to all stakeholders regardless of their property experience.

WeNow is a plug-and-play solution connected to the car that helps companies measure reduce and offset the carbon emissions of their vehicles fleet. 
 We coach every driver to drive more eco-friendly and make savings. With WeNow mobility is now sustainable and profitable. Imagine: what if all cars were planting trees while driving?

At WeNow we develop an ICT-enabled solution to tackle climate change. In a context where the mobility sector is particularly concerned by the urge to reduce carbon emissions (increased carbon taxes fuel prices forbidden access to cities for highly pollutant cars) we offer an unprecedented and unique all-in-one solution to reduce to zero our customers' carbon footprint. 
 
 Our solution is innovative and entirely based on the ICT and ioT fields. Once our device (the WeNowBox) is connected to the car through OBD sensors. 
 
 First the driver can measure his car's carbon emissions energy efficiency fuel consumption speed … thanks to powerful data that are tracked per second and through OBD sensors. Our connected solution is also designed with powerful algorithms that we have developed.
 
 Second the driver can reduce his fuel consumption thanks to a digital coaching programme which gives him all the necessary tools and advice to drive eco-friendly and reach energy-efficiency step by step. In a context where technology is moving fast we have decided to develop a scalable device to tackle climate change in the long run. Further developments of our solution include gamification compatibility with electrical hybrid CNG environments and Nox tracking. 
 
 And third offset. The driver can offset his unavoidable car emissions by financing voluntary offsetting projects to become climate neutral. The user is updated about the news of his project directy on the mobile app. We are offering our clients access to 8 internationally certified projects that meet the highest standards: the United Nation's the Gold Standard CCB Standards and the Verified Carbon Standard. In addition we also plant trees locally in order to engage participants and have a positive netto impact. 
 
 Our solution helps user be sensitized about carbon and the impact of their mobility. We also partner with mobility actors by offering green-routing. 
 We are working on the certification of the savings in order to reward users for their efforts and to offer smart cities solutions. 
 
 In two words we offer our clients a very simple affordable and replicable solution to reach carbon neutrality and long-term change of behavior.
 
 We have identified and proved that the fuel hence GHG savings generated by our WeNow solution reach 10 to 15%. Some of our customers have even reached higher savings: up to 25% reduced energy bill after 6 months of using our WeNow solution. 
 
 Our competitive advantage is that we offer companies and individuals a profitable solution that helps them have an impact on climate: their investment on our solution is directly made profitable with their savings on fuel.
 
 We are working on the integration of the block chain technology in order to make our solution even more profitable. 
 
 Our device has helped organizations improve carbon footprint practices and cost efficiency because it is an easy-to-use and certified solution. The automatic and real-time carbon assessment of transport activities we offer strengthens their engagement to reducing their carbon footprint and increases road safety (ADEME-certified).

CIVITEO est une société de conseil spécialisée dans la gestion de la donnée au service des politiques publiques. Nous nous associons pour un challenge VIVATECH REGION CENTRE VAL DE LOIRE avec OPENNORTH société canadienne pionnière mondiale de l'opendata

Et si la gestion des dépenses publiques devenait aussi claire et compréhensible que celle de nos dépenses quotidiennes ? Et si en plus de comprendre ses enjeux nous pouvions faciliter le travail des décideurs locaux chargés de sa bonne gestion ? 
 Le budget participatif permet aujourd’hui de consulter les citoyens sur 5% maximum du budget d’investissement d’une ville. Notre méthode permet de consulter les citoyens usagers sur les 95% restant ainsi que jusqu’à 100% du budget de fonctionnement.
 Nous proposons un outil qui va bien au-delà de la simple consultation citoyenne car non seulement il donne concrètement la parole à l'usager pour qu'il puisse effectuer ses propres choix en toute connaissance de cause mais il permet aussi et surtout d'engager un véritable dialogue avec l'élu décideur final responsable des arbitrages budgétaires et du bien vivre ensemble.
 Nous utilisons une méthode d'analyse quantitative la méthode SIMALTO qui a fait ses preuves dans plus de 100 institutions publiques en Europe (1/4 des villes anglaises l’ont utilisé).
 Avec CIVIMETRIC nous proposons une expérience de la démocratie collaborative sur des sujets beaucoup plus larges tout en restant très pragmatique. Nous pensons que le budget public ou les grands projets d’aménagement du territoire bien que complexes peuvent être partagés avec les citoyens. 
 Nous croyons qu’il est possible sur la base de l’avis de chacun de faire des arbitrages qui bénéficient à tous et de préserver la qualité de vie tout en faisant preuve de pragmatisme.
 Notre objectif est de permettre aux citoyens usagers et aux décideurs locaux de mieux se comprendre dans les choix importants qui sont devant nous.
 L'intérêt de notre méthode est multiple :
 
 1- Accompagner les élus dans leurs décisions en leur permettant de mieux appréhender l'attente des usagers/contribuables et peut-être de mieux expliquer ensuite les choix retenus. Pour obtenir des résultats synthétiques et pragmatiques nous utilisons l’intelligence artificielle d’un algorithme. Nous proposons un outil décisionnel performant.
 
 2- Faciliter la gestion des finances publiques dans un contexte de réforme du système des dotations et de la fiscalité locale. 
 
 3- Créer une dynamique de participation d’implication des citoyens en leur permettant de mieux comprendre les thèmes jusqu’alors trop complexes comme le budget municipal. Nous mettons l'usager dans la « peau du décideur » avec ses choix et donc ses arbitrages notamment en matière de coût mais pas uniquement afin de le sensibiliser aux enjeux des budgets et des projets locaux.
 
 Concrètement notre méthode s’applique aussi bien à un budget dans sa globalité section de fonctionnement et section d'investissement qu'un budget annexe administratif ou industriel et commercial voire une zone d'aménagement urbain. Les exemples d’application sont nombreux et variés.
keywords: budgets publics et aménagement du territoire

We are a leading healthcare technology company specializing in virtual care solutions for patients with chronic and complex diseases. Medocity enables optimized continuous care between visits - when the patient is not in the doctor’s office or clinic. Our enterprise-level platform offers physicians pharmaceutical companies and payers the most comprehensive approach to connected care for any chronic disease including but not limited to cancer heart failure diabetes COPD depression dermatology and related co-morbidities. Medocity’s solution improves patient engagement and satisfaction results in better outcomes and reduces total healthcare costs.
 
 The Medocity platform is flexible modular and fully customizable to meet multiple clinical strategic and business goals:
 
 1. Engage and empower patients with decision support tools curated educational resources medication reminders and dynamic care plans to improve adherence promote positive behaviors and increase patient satisfaction. 
 2. Manage and track symptoms and side effects vital signs and medications 
 3. Detect potential issues earlier with advanced clinical algorithms patient guidance and real-time alerts that can identify patients with escalating symptoms or who are in need of immediate attention
 4. Allow HCPs to intervene directly with patients using secure messaging video visits and integrated telephony to prevent avoidable complications hospitalizations and ED visits. 
 5. Coordinate care across disciplines and dispersed locations with shared care team access 
 
 The Medocity Platform offers an omni-channel approach to engage patients via full BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) capabilities. Patients (and providers) don’t need to obtain or adjust to new form factors or operating systems: they can use their own iOS or Android phones and tablets the web and now voice-activated assistants like Alexa or Google Assistant all synched in real time. Medocity is currently working on integrating chatbots to further complement the experience.
 
 Medocity’s enterprise-level platform is optimal for global implementations as it can handle any language regardless of character set or direction. Through its flexible configuration options Medocity also enables customized experiences for every brand indication and country if desired.

Technovera is a social impact startup that is focused on technology inclusion with the aim of improving the last mile for chronic medication access in Africa. We’ve developed Pelebox a smart locker system that enables patients to collect their repeat chronic medication in under 2 minutes instead of waiting hours on queues at public clinics. South Africa has world's biggest antiretroviral therapy (ART) programme for patients living with HIV and AIDS and there's been a steady increase in the number of patients with non-communicable diseases (NCDs) requiring chronic therapy. A patient's experience tends to be one of long waiting times typically above 3 hours. This poses potential adherence barriers which may lead to poor health outcomes and places a strain on the patients in terms of transport costs and loss of income.
 
 Pre-packed medication for a particular patient is loaded into an internet enabled smart locker the system then sends an SMS with a one-time-pin (OTP) to the patients. The patient would then come to a collection unit authenticate themselves using a one-time-pin (OTP) together with their cellphone number. A cubicle that has their medication would then pop-open. The systems keeps track of all collection records and can be integrated into a patient records management system.
 
 Technovera has been working with the City of Tshwane and the National Department of Health in South Africa on a pilot aimed at showing the impact of technology on reducing the average time spent in a clinic and adoption from patients. Thus far we have reached over 3500 patients with an average collection duration of 36 seconds (much lower than the anticipated 2 min). Technovera is now looking to engage in creating opportunities and collaborate with partners who can help us reach more sites and more patients.

Cryptocurrency refers to a virtual medium of exchange created and stored electronically in the blockchain distinguishable from other currencies in that it uses cryptographic technology to decentralize the creation of monetary units and securely verify transactions. This space includes companies providing services or developing technology related to the exchange of cryptocurrency the storage of cryptocurrency the facilitation of payments using cryptocurrency and securing cryptocurrency ledgers via mining activities. The blockchain refers to a digital ledger that provides a secure way of making and recording transactions agreements and contracts. Blockchains are unique in that their ledger is distributed across a network of computers such that it cannot be controlled by a single entity and has no single point of failure. This space includes companies involved in developing blockchain applications related to smart contracts crowd funding supply chain auditing cryptocurrency identity management intellectual property and file storage among others.

At Dawex we believe companies need to become data-driven companies in order to compete and thrive: they need both to consume a lot of data easily and from multiple sources and to generate new revenue streams from the commercialization of their data assets.
 
 Dawex is the global data marketplace where organizations meet buy and sell data directly and securely. Acting as a trusted third-party we operate on a transactional-based revenue model.
 
 On Dawex each organization is rigorously vetted with a strict process to ensure its identity. Companies can monetize datasets & APIs raw data refined data & insights. Any kind of data are traded: customer and product-related data financial data IoT data licensed as one-off deals or subscriptions. Thanks to the Dawex data marketplace providers can highlight the value of their data while retaining complete control over the distribution and configuration of usage rights. Dawex enables organizations to find the most relevant data sources schedule recurring data exchanges over time and receive notifications regarding new opportunities.
 
 Our approach based on data privacy by design and by default ensures that each organization benefits from all necessary information to satisfy legal obligations particularly when transferring data containing personal information.
 
 In just over a year 2200+ companies active in 20+ business sectors have registered on Dawex providing access to a variety of data buyers and sellers. A majority of sellers registered on Dawex had never exchanged or commercialized data before. Our platform provides them with a trusted environment to build and grow their data business resulting in new revenue streams opportunities increasing also the supply of data and satisfying a growing demand.
 
 The growth and expansion was fueled by the announce of several partnerships in 2017 with consulting firms such as PwC or Sia Partners and technology companies such as Mnubo (IoT/Analytics/AI). We opened offices in Montreal and San Francisco to increase the presence in the US and leveraged Blockchain technology to ensure the immutability of the licensing deals made on the marketplace.
 
 We are a team of experienced engineers developers and data scientists based in France in the United States and Canada. Our goal is to build the first Global Data Exchange in order to facilitate cross border data flow and make data exchange accessible and secure for all economic stakeholders.

descriptif:
Projet de création du bureau commercial Europe (QGE) puis centre de R&D dans les domaines des systèmes de stockage d'énergie (piles hydrogène) de la mobilité électrique (drones et aviation légère) et des objets industriels connectés. Le bureau comprendrait une personne au démarrage. Dans un second temps avec la mise en place des activités de recherche et de développement de produits innovants le projet devrait créer au moins 8-10 emplois très qualifiés sur trois ans.
 Le projet est porté par une start-up singapourienne qui a développé des systèmes basés sur la technologie pile à hydrogène pour des applications drones militaires et de sécurité en milieu isolé ainsi que des solutions de suivi en temps réel sur des terrains où l'accès aux réseaux (électriquetélécommunication GPS) est limité.
 Il s'agirait de la première implantation en Europe du groupe déjà présent à l'international. 
 Projet d'implantation de création de bureau européen (QGE) et à terme centre de R&D dans les domaines des systèmes de stockage d'énergie (piles hydrogène) de la mobilité électrique (drones et aviation légère) et des objets industriels connectés. 
 Le projet vise le domaine stratégique des systèmes de stockage d'énergie et de recharge pour la mobilité (électricité hydrogène) (micro segments focus DGE).

Projet de création captif Paris (PRE et Paris & Co informé en amont car visite lors de la semaine du 15/01)
 
 Cette startup hongkongaise créée il y a 4 ans propose un service de mesure de la qualité de l'air intérieur et extérieur à destination des entreprises et organisations (B2B). Elle utilise pour ce des objets connectés et une plate-forme en ligne qu'elle conçoit elle-même.
 
 Faisant le constat que les pays d'Europe de l'Ouest sont des marchés plus mûrs pour ce type d'information le fondateur de l'entreprise qui est français souhaite implanter à Paris la filiale européenne de la société.
 
 Au-delà de l'aspect commercial cette filiale aura également des fonctions de service et de R&D.
 
 Nous sommes sollicités pour accompagner l'entreprise dans son implantation en France (locaux enregistrement de la société mise en relation avec l'écosystème local).

Créée en 2013 cette start-up québécoise a créé une solution d'optimisation de la génération Hydro (Nanogrid technology) : une plate-forme avancée le « HydroGrid » qui optimise la rentabilité et la flexibilité de la production d'hydroélectricité.
 La solution qui consiste en une partie logicielle et une partie hardware est destinée à des clients avec une consommation d'électricité inférieure à 250kw. Les clients cibles sont des petits commerciaux industriels et les chaînes de restaurants d'hôtels de banques des bureaux…
 Le groupe souhaite établir une présence physique en Europe d'ici fin 2018. Un consultant a été embauché en France pour évaluer le marché et lancer le développement du groupe. La société a une préférence pour la France pour des raisons de localisation géographique de fort potentiel du marché (ils sont déjà en conversations avec quelques grands groupes français) et de langue mais ils ont des appréhensions typiques (cout élevé de la main d'Å“uvre droit de travail taux d'IS élevé). Ils considèrent quelques pays européens pour leur bureau Europe y compris l'Irlande et le Luxembourg.
 Ce bureau servirait d'EHQ du groupe et emploierait 5-10 personnes sur trois ans (des commerciaux et des ingénieurs). Possibilité d'avoir une fonction R&D afin de bénéficier du CIR.
 Projet captif IDF ouverture pour mi / fin 2018.
 Le partenaire régional a été informé en amont.

COMICSTRIP est une start-up américaine basée à New-York fondée en 2014. Elle emploie 20 personnes aux États-Unis et en Australie.
 
 COMICSTRIP développe une plateforme numérique permettant le trading d'électricité de pair-à-pair sans intermédiaire via la blockchain ainsi que le hardware associé. Un premier microgrid pilote est opérationnel depuis début 2016 à Brooklyn. Véritable réussite technologique ce dernier a eu un retentissement mondial et va bientôt être répliqué en Australie.
 
 COMICSTRIP souhaite ouvrir son siège européen d'ici 12 à 24 mois. L'Allemagne la France et le Royaume-Uni dans une moindre mesure sont considérés. Ce bureau emploierait dans un premier temps une dizaine de personnes pour de la gestion de projet et du business development. A moyen-terme une équipe de développeurs informatiques serait mise en place.
 
 COMICSTRIP ne privilégie pas de localisation particulière l'élément déclencheur étant la possibilité d'y développer un projet pilote. Une connexion aisée avec le reste de l'Europe (LGV aéroport) est toutefois importante. En parallèle COMICSTRIP a spontanément émit un intérêt pour les iles françaises ultramarines potentiellement intéressées par leur technologie qui améliore la résilience des réseaux électriques.
 
 COMICSTRIP assiste régulièrement à des conférences en Europe. Aussi il sera possible d'organiser des visites en région dès septembre 2017 à la rencontre de l'écosystème français autour des SmartGrids de partenaires et de clients potentiels.
 
 Des documents de présentation sont disponibles en pièce jointe de cette fiche.

SkyBoy est un projet créé par quatre utopistes New-Tech convaincus qu’au lieu de tenter de changer le monde il est préférable de changer notre regard sur le monde. Et pour changer le regard que nous portons sur le monde SkyBoy a inventé et breveté l’Overlap Reality® une nouvelle génération d’expériences immersives née du croisement entre technologie vidéo et scénographie territoriale. Ainsi lorsqu’un visiteur d’un lieu touristique ou commercial pointe son Smartphone devant lui il découvre ce lieu sous un autre jour et se retrouve immergé dans une histoire ou une action qui se déroule à l’endroit exact où il se situe et à 360° autour de lui.

Toujours sur mesure et parfois en marque blanche une expérience SkyBoy se vit au travers d’une
 application mobile restituée sur les Smartphones des publics cible ou de tablettes mises à disposition
 sur site.
 En s’appuyant sur sa technologie exclusive d’Overlap Reality SkyBoy optimise les effets de la réalité
 augmentée ; un outil original mis aux services des sites touristiques de l’événementiel et d’une
 nouvelle génération de retail.
 • Pour le public : SkyBoy c’est un moyen de voir l’invisible de changer d’espace temps
 de vivre une expérience immersive à 360° tout autour de lui.
 • Pour les sites touristiques et culturels : SkyBoy c’est une nouvelle source de mise en relief un moyen d’interpeler le publique de faire venir.
 • Pour le retail : SkyBoy c’est une nouvelle source de concepts vivants et holistiques. Un moyen de plonger le public au coeur d’une nouvelle génération d’expériences de marque.
 
 Une expérience SkyBoy n’est visible qu’à un endroit précis. C’est ce principe de géolocalisation qui génère l’effet waouh. Cependant les projets sont pensés de manière bien plus globale afin de toucher un très large public.
 C’est pourquoi des dispositifs de viralisation web et RP sont mis en place par nos partenaires pour créer le Buzz faire venir et faire savoir.
 Une technologie brevetée qui améliore la réalité augmentée :
 SkyBoy augmente l’expérience vécue in situ en mettant en relief et en mouvement les territoires et les espaces. Transporter le spectateur dans l’envers d’un lieu nourrir sensiblement son lien à la marque qui y est mise en scène et in fine augmenter notre conscience du territoire. L’expérience SkyBoy est unique.

Nature du projet:
 
 Création d'une filiale en France pour la commercialisation des robots médicaux en France. A ce stade l'entreprise n'a pas encore décidé si cette nouvelle entité pilote des essais cliniques ou s'occupera uniquement des activités commerciales.
 
 Ce point sera clarifié au fur et à mesure de l'évolution de ses contacts avec des médecins français qui l'aideront à mener ses essais cliniques en France.
 
 Porteur du projet :
 
 Une spin-off d'une université japonaise nationale connue spécialisée dans le robot exosquelette à l'application médicale.
 Ses produits sont dédiés pour la réhabilitation de patients paralysés suite à l'apoplexie le traumatisme médullaire et les maladies neuraux difficilement curables (neural intractable disease).
 
 Contexte :
 
 Le porteur du projet cible le marché européen depuis des années. Ayant obtenu le marquage CE l'entreprise mène déjà ses activités commerciales en Europe en particulIer en Allemagne où se trouve une filiale avec quelques employés.
 En septembre 2017 une délégation de médecins français adhérents du CNEH (CENTRE NATIONAL DE L'EXPERTISE HOSPITALIERE) a rendu visite au siège du porteur du projet. La réaction de la délégation est très positive et le porteur du projet envisage de mettre en place des essais cliniques de leur produit en France avec les soutiens de médecins adhérents du CNEH. C'est dans ce contexte que le porteur du projet souhaite envisager de mener des essais cliniques en France avec des médecins cliniciens français dans ce domaine. Cet exercice entraînera en principe la création d'une filiale en France.
 
 Projet mobile : IDF et ARA
 -Le porteur du projet a shortlisté Paris et Lyon.
 
 Contact :
 Director of Business Promotion Office

Dans le cadre du programme French Founders TORCHE souhaiterait étudier la création d'un bureau pour l'Europe et qui serait basé en France.
 
 TORCHE est une start-up formée par un groupe de médecins et d'informaticiens qui ont développé une solution pour prévenir les blessures au genou chez les coureurs. Ce sont des capteurs très légers placés dans la poche du pantalon au niveau du genou et qui lisent la cadence de la course de l'athlète et calculent exactement la symétrie des mouvements.
 
 Rencontre avec le CEO à Madison Wisconsin

Visiomed est une plateforme d'assistance de santé numérique où les soignants peuvent effectuer leurs propres consultations numériques. La plateforme permet de faire des consultations par vidéo avec les patients.
 Visiomed a des clients à l'échelle nationale et internationale. En Suède plusieurs régions ont choisi de démarrer la plateforme Visiomed en centre médical municipal. La division internationale du centre d'appel d'urgence de Suède a par ailleurs sélectionné le système Visiomed. L'entreprise collabore depuis 2016 avec Cisco qui a récemment repris la société britannique Arcano. La technologie d'Arcano a été intégrée dans le système de Visiomed. Et une filiale a été développée au Royaume-Uni fin 2016 afin d'avoir une présence plus importante sur ce marché. 
 L'entreprise souhaite se focaliser sur le marché européen et son prochain grand objectif est la France.
 L'entreprise souhaiterais obtenir un rendez-vous avec la spécialise santé chez Business France mais également acquérir une meilleure compréhension du potentiel de leurs activités en France. 
 L'entreprise désire un accompagnement de la part de Business France et de ses partenaires régionaux afin de créer et développer une filiale en France. Visiomed souhaite avoir une présence locale en France et entreprendrait d'embaucher 10-15 personnes sous 3 ans.

Projet création R&D - 5 emplois - Mobile France (Ile de France Auvergne Rhone Alpes Bourgogne Franche-Comté) 
 
 Société créée en 2014 (était à la base une spin-off de l'EPFL) compte actuellement 08 personnes.
 
 La société a développé une technologie de sol connecté via un capteur (envoi de données provenant du sol vers un cloud – dvpt d'algorithmes) permettant ainsi l'analyse de flux de personnes au sein de magasins ou au cours d'évènements (calcul exact de protagonistes présents gestion de files d'attente renforcement de la sécurité etc..). Cette technologie est également capable de détecter la chute de personnes en temps rééel utile notamment pour le corps médical (maisons de retraites etc.) et d'indiquer de manière très détaillée si une personne est tombée sur le sol et dans quelle position elle se trouve.
 
 La technologie développée par la société peut aussi bien correspondre au secteur de la santé (silver economy) des transports publics du sport du retail etc. Le flux d'affluence est également disponible en temps réel sur smartphone.
 
 En termes de localisation le CEO souhaite étudier trois zones : L'Ile de France qu'il privilégie Bourgogne Franche-Comté et Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes parce que la logique de proximité peut être intéressante.
 
 Le CEO souhaite organiser une visite de site sur Paris et en région Parisienne le plus tôt possible à savoir au cours du mois de septembre afin de prendre contact avec le pôle de compétitivité « CAP Digital » notamment et avoir un aperçu de l'éco-system parisien + mise en contact avec la BPI. Disponibilités : 182022 25 et 29 septembre.
